posts.post_title: FS: T213-2 Coupon - Mitchell, Mowrey (Pitt N), Ames (Cin) - Price Drop
posts.post_content:
The following cards are For Sale or Trade.  

Prices include shipping.  

Paypal OK if you cover the fee.

For larger scans [URL="http://picasaweb.google.com/Abravefan11/PreWarForSaleForTrade#"]CLICK HERE[/URL] click on the image and click the magnifying glass to the right.

If preferred, I can email the larger scans.

If you have any questions please email me at: [url]abravefan@msn.com[/url]

T213-2 Mike Mitchell SGC 30 - $75
T213-2 Mike Mowrey SGC 30 - $75
T213-2 Red Ames SGC 20 - $50
